text:
Hack Reactor | San Francisco, CA | Technical Mentor | Full Time | ONSITE

Hack Reactor's mission is twofold: to empower people and to transform education through rapid-iteration teaching.

Technical Mentors at Hack Reactor work with our students to teach them Javascript fundamentals, engineering best practices and ensure they are technically prepared for their job search. We are looking to make multiple hires for this position.

https://www.smartrecruiters.com/HackReactor/93891912--hack-r...
